__TOC__

This is the main index page for "Ubuntu on '''POWER8'''" "Ubuntu on '''POWER9'''"and "Ubuntu on '''OpenPOWER'''".<<BR>>

When referring to any of these, please use the word '''POWER''', in all caps. (In this context, POWER refers to the ppc64el hardware architecture.) When there are differences, please specify whether you are referring to POWER8 or POWER9 or OpenPOWER.<<BR>>

There is a community-maintained page here that is collecting useful information about Ubuntu enablement on POWER hardware
http://wiki.ubuntu.com/ppc64el <<BR>>

http://askubuntu.com is a great place to reach out to the community for support. (Remember to tag your question with '''POWER8''', '''POWER9''', '''ppc64el''')

The main page for OpenPOWER foundation-related information is here:  http://openpowerfoundation.org/ <<BR>>

If you can't find what you're looking for, or for general information about Ubuntu's POWER initiatives, please reach out to:
<<BR>>
Randall Ross<<BR>>
Ubuntu Community Manager - POWER<<BR>>
